name: Jagged Escape
description:
Will you Escape?
Your Mission:
Escape and Un Lock six Sectors.
Then collect the Gold Bars to Un Lock your Escape path.

Zig Zag your way through the jagged maze Sectors, whilst collecting points and Gold along your way.
Fly through Portals to go through walls.
Choose the right path for you're escape.
Avoid all walls and obstacles trying to stop you're escape!!

Features-
-One tap game play
-8 levels to unlock
-4 Characters/Space ships to unlock
-Game Centre leader board to challenge friends.



Music and SFX by Eric Matyas
www.soundimage.org
